d.f: ￹￺come to light * be revealed￻到世上，到外面，顯露出來，啟示出來

e: ￹`Talahekal~ `to~ `ko~ `foting~.￺The fish came to shore.￻魚衝上沙灘
d.f: ￹￺to come to shore * to come to the surface￻上岸，浮上水面

e: ￹`Talahekal~ `to~ `anini~ `ko~ `tatiih~`ay~ `a~ `demak~ `nira~.￺The wrong he did has come to light.￻他的壞事以暴露出來了，他的劣跡已東窗事發了
￹`O~ `pi~`patalahekal~ `to~ `demak~ `iso~ `ko~ `nnga'ay~.￺You should confess the truth about what you did.￻你還是坦白承認你所做的一切為上策
￹`O~ `ta~`talahekal~ `ci~`~ `Yis~ `Kristo~.￺Jesus Christ will appear.￻耶穌基督即將顯現
